channel.title: Help me please....wont start
channel.description:
Client Is loading...... ----------------------- Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any key to continue . . .
this is what happens when i run some clients... [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 05:59:36 pm[/size][hr]Jesus does anybody reply???? ive searched this problem and none have replies!

item.title: Help me please....wont start
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

that error message pretty much means there is not enough available memory to run the client, and thus it aborts. try closing all applications then run it again. if it still doesn’t work, maybe you just don’t have enough RAM or something.

also, if you have a lot of unnecessary services running, you can do Ctrl+Alt+Del and end them. that can also save some memory.

Read full topic
